title: marulu konnadhirA (jaavali)
sahitya:
marulu konnadirA mAnini maNi nipai

anupallavi

 paripari vidamuga parita pincucu nIpai

caraNam 1

 dharalO tanaku nIvE tagina vallabhuDani taruNi mikkili ninnu dalaci dalaci cAla

caraNam 2

marakatAngi krUruDau marupAri kOrvaka manasu karagi nIvu madana kELilO cAla

caraNam 3

vanaja nEtruDau shrInivAsa nAyaka nIdu vallagAni mATalO nellapudunu pati
